definition[0]: the way in which someone explains or understands an event, information, someone’s actions etc
example[0]: One possible interpretation is that they want you to resign.
example[1]: It’s difficult to put an accurate interpretation on (=explain) the survey results.
example[2]: What exactly the author meant by that statement is open to interpretation (=able to be understood or explained in different ways).
definition[1]: the way in which someone performs a play, a piece of music etc and shows what they think and feel about it
example[3]: Laurence Olivier’s brilliant interpretation of Henry V
